amendment.description: Page 16, line 2, insert after "otherwise prohibited by law" the following: "(other than section 552a of title 5, United States Code)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-363 to clarify the application of 5 USC 552a (The Privacy Act) to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Collins (GA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
